title: Return a list of parcel delivery order

Success 200.description: Parcel leaves pickup location on this date
Parcel arrives at its final destination on this date

examples.title: Success
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200
 {
   status
   data: [
    {
     "parcel_id": 6,
     "placed_by": 4,
     "weight": 2.1,
     "weight_metric": "kg",
     "sender": "Victoria Fellowship Church, Lekki",
     "receiver": "University of Sheffield, S1 2ER, UK",
     "current_location": "Lagos airport",
     "status": "transiting",
     "active": true
     "sent_on": "2018-11-18T15:09:07.031Z",
     "delivered_on": ""
    },
   ...
   ]
  message: Number of active Parcel orders: 4
}

title: Activate and return a parcel delivery order

Success 200.description: Parcel leaves pickup location on this date
Parcel arrives at its final destination on this date

examples.title: Success
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 202 ACCEPTED
{
  status: 202
  data: {
    "parcel_id": 1,
    "placed_by": 2,
    "weight": 1.3,
    "weight_metric": "Kilogramme",
    "sender": "Victoria Fellowship Church, Lekki",
    "receiver": "University of Sheffield, S1 2ER, UK",
    "current_location": "MM Airport, Ikeja, Lagos",
    "status": "placed",
    "active": true
    "sent_on": "2018-11-18T15:09:07.031Z",
    "delivered_on": ""
  },
  message: "This parcel is now being processed"
}
